title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a tone in a dream by the most famous interpretation scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing tuna fish in a dream by the most famous interpretive scholars, as seeing fish in a dream is one of the good visions, which carry many different interpretations and connotations, as it is often evidence of kindness and living for the fortuneteller, and it also differs in the dream of an unmarried woman, a pregnant woman , married, which many dream interpretation scholars have worked hard to clarify, and during this article we will explain to you the interpretation of the dream by seeing the tone in it. A dream by the most famous scholars of interpretation. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a tuna in a dream. According to what was explained by the scholar Ibn Sirin, seeing tuna in a dream is good. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a tuna in a dream is also: Seeing tuna in general is considered a sign of halal money. Also, seeing canned tuna is considered A sign of a lot of halal food that the fortuneteller is saving for his future. Seeing cans of tuna in a dream. It is an indication of the livelihood that the dreamer will gain, but it will come after a lot of time and effort, as well as exhaustion. In addition to seeing cans of tuna being opened in the dream. It is A sign of abundant sustenance, relief of distress, and indicates near comfort. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing one’s forehead in a dream by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about tuna for a single womanAs this vision in an unmarried girl’s dream brings good news to her, and is a harbinger of happiness and success that this girl will achieve in Her life, and many scholars and translators have explained it, and along these lines we explain to you. The interpretation of a dream about tuna for a single woman is also: Seeing buying tuna in a dream is a harbinger of the success that the girl will achieve. Also, if a girl sees in a dream that she is catching a tuna fish. It is evidence of ways to The livelihood that you will get and it has not been taken into account. In addition, seeing tuna in a dream is something specific to single women. It is evidence that he got the new job and a lot of money. Also, an unmarried girl seeing in a dream that she is catching dead tuna Or rotten. It is a sign of bad news. See also: Interpretation of a dream about smoke in a dream from the most famous interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a dream about tuna for a married woman. These interpretations and meanings contained in these dreams differ, and their difference depends on the social status of the dreamer as well as on the details that appear in the dream and in many scenes. The lines of the paragraph that we are presenting to you. The interpretation of a dream about tuna for a married woman is also: Seeing the tone in a married woman’s dream. This dream is evidence of a lot of diligence to earn money. Also, dreaming of a married woman eating tuna indicates financial stability that the woman will move to in the near future. In addition Therefore, this vision is evidence of the goodness and abundance in which you live. The dream interpretation of this vision in a dream for a married woman is evidence of the good news of pregnancy in the near future. See also: The complete interpretation of the dream of seeing the jinn in a dream by the most famous interpreters. The interpretation of seeing canned fish in A dream, since this vision may come true

title: Interpretation of the bride in a dream for single, married and pregnant women

preview.html: In the following paragraphs, we will explain to you the interpretation of the bride in a dream according to what was interpreted by the scholar Ibn Sirin. The bride is the girl on her wedding night, and what distinguishes her is that she is wearing a white wedding dress. Sometimes a woman sees in her dream that she is wearing a wedding dress, and when she wakes up she is engaged in thinking. Regarding the meaning of this vision and its significance, scholars believe that the meaning of this dream varies according to the condition of the married sleeper and the pregnant woman in detail.Interpretation of the bride in a dreamInterpretation of the bride in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin believes that seeing the bride in a dream indicates the emergence of problems and difficulties that the dreamer will suffer from in his life.And if The sleeper saw in his dream a bride and his dream lacked singing and dancing, so this is Mahmoud’s dream that shows the change that is taking place in the dreamer’s life and makes it better. If one dreams and sees a bride in a huge wedding, then this is a bad vision that indicates the occurrence of misfortunes and tribulations and may indicate the death of one of the dreamer’s relatives. And only God knows the time. The scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing the bride in a dream is a bad sign for the dreamer and not a good one. If the sleeper sees in his dream that people are presenting to him as a groom or a bride, then this is a good vision that shows the reputation of the fortuneteller among the people. Hearing singing in a dream portends events Happy in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of seeing a bride in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a wedding dress, this is a good vision that promises the dreamer that he will achieve all the goals he desires. And if an unmarried woman sees in her dream a doll wearing a wedding dress, then this vision It indicates the date of her approaching engagement or wedding. Dream interpretation scholars say that if an unmarried girl sees her bride in her dream and hears drums and songs in this dream, then this is an unpleasant vision that indicates the arrival of worries and problems that will disturb her. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is a bride sitting Next to the groom whom she knows, this is a good vision that heralds happy news and may indicate the girl’s excellence in studies or her promotion at work. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is going to a wedding for unknown people, then this vision indicates a great experience in the girl’s life. Interpretation of the vision A bride in a dream for a married woman. Jurists say that if a married woman dreams and sees in her dream that she is wearing a wedding dress, then this vision indicates that she will move to live in another place, and this vision may indicate her travels. Also, seeing a married woman wearing a white wedding dress in a dream indicates that This woman has a good heart and a pure personality, and she likes to see things positively. Seeing a girl wearing a wedding dress in a married woman’s dream indicates that God Almighty will carry her in the near future. Seeing a bride in a married woman’s dream indicates the stability of her married life and that she will live a good life with Her husband without problems. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is wearing a bride’s dress and she is happy with it, then this dream indicates the arrival of sufficient sustenance and a lot of goodness in her life. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant bride in a dream. If a woman sees a pregnant woman

title: Seeing pigeon chicks in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing pigeon chicks in a dream according to Ibn Sirin is one of the visions that many people search for. Therefore, you are presented with a different website. In this article, the interpretation of this vision with an explanation of all its interpretations. Seeing pigeon chicks in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of seeing pigeons in a dream by Ibn Sirin is that this vision expresses the dreamer’s faith and is also evidence of safety from falling into evil. He said Imam Muhammad Ibn Sirin said that seeing chicks in a dream is one of the visions that express hearing good news that satisfies the heart. Imam Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a pigeon chick in a dream for a single woman is one of the visions that indicate that the girl will soon marry a good man who seeks to make her happy and not disturb her. Her peace because he fulfills all her requests. If an unmarried girl sees pigeon chicks in a dream and their color is black, then this dream indicates many problems that the dreamer faces in her life. Seeing pigeon chicks in a dream according to Ibn Sirin for married people expresses compatibility between the spouses and is also evidence of abundance. Income enters the family and thus improves their circumstances. If the color of the chicks is white, while if the color of the chicks is black, this dream expresses the many disputes that exist between the dreamer and his family. If the person hears the sound of black pigeons in a dream, this vision expresses the serious distress that After thinking about the interpretation of seeing chicks in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, it is worth noting to clarify the interpretation of seeing a cage with pigeons in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi, as Imam Al-Nabulsi said that if the dreamer sees in a dream a cage with pigeons, this dream expresses About the abundant goodness that he will receive in the coming days. Imam Al-Nabulsi interpreted buying a cage of pigeons in a dream as one of the visions that indicate the dreamer buying a new house in which he will move to live with his family. According to Al-Nabulsi, slaughtering a cage of pigeons in a dream is one of the visions that express the marriage of the fortuneteller. With the maid who serves him and works for him. If one sees that he is catching pigeons in a dream, this vision indicates that he will earn a lot of money from the honorable trade in which he works. If one sees that he is feeding pigeons in a dream, this vision indicates that the dreamer will learn some sciences. Which will benefit him in his practical life. If one sees pigeon eggs in his dream, this vision indicates good offspring of boys and girls who will help the dreamer in his life through assistance and justice with him. If one sees in a dream that he is carrying the wings of a dove, then this vision according to Al-Nabulsi is from The most promising visions, as they show the dreamer's abundance of sustenance and can also express his liberation from all his sins. Binding. Seeing a small dove in a dream. Imam Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing a small dove in a dream as one of the visions that show the offspring that the dreamer will have. If the small dove he sees in the dream flies, then this dream expresses the dreamer’s journey abroad and God will write a lot for him. Manal

title: The 7 most important interpretations of seeing slippers in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing single slippers in a dream? A sign of the arrival of goodness and abundant food. What does it mean for a married woman to see that she has lost her sandals? Evidence of many problems that she is exposed to. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself wearing red slippers? Evidence of the approaching date of the wedding of one of her children. What does it mean to see Losing slippers? A sign of great financial loss. What is the interpretation of a man who sees that he is wearing black fur slippers? A sign of selfishness and self-love. What does it mean to see yourself wearing pink slippers? Coming soon: Proof of engagement or marriage. What is the interpretation of a married woman exchanging slippers with her husband? A sign On marital problems and disputes. Interpretation of seeing slippers in a dream: If an unmarried girl sees slippers in her dream, this indicates the arrival of kindness, abundant living, and abundant money. When the dreamer sees in a dream that he has taken off his slippers, this is a sign that he will put more effort into his work. But if A married woman saw a man wearing tight slippers, a sign of his many fears and anxieties. While a married woman’s dream symbolizes that she has lost her slippers, it is evidence of many problems she faces. For a pregnant woman to dream of cutting off slippers means weakness and fear of childbirth, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision of losing slippers In a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman losing her slippers in a dream indicates a tense relationship with her husband. If he sees the loss of slippers in a dream, this is a sign that in the coming days he will suffer a great financial loss. When she sees the slippers falling into the water, then they disappear and disappear, which indicates deteriorating health. For a woman. While seeing a married woman losing her slippers symbolizes facing many serious consequences, difficulties and problems. As for seeing her losing her slippers and wearing other slippers, it is evidence of some psychological disorders. Interpretation of a dream about a fur slipper in a dream: If an unmarried girl sees that she is wearing white fur slippers in a dream This means that the date of her marriage to a good young man is approaching. When a man dreams that he is wearing black fur slippers, this is a sign of selfishness and self-love. Seeing a pregnant woman wearing blue fur slippers in a dream is a sign of feeling safe and psychologically comfortable during this period. While seeing wearing brown fur slippers In a dream, the dreamer is characterized by hatred, hatred, and hatred of others. But if a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is wearing fur slippers, this is evidence of the stable life that she enjoys. Interpretation of a dream about red slippers for a married woman: Seeing a married woman buying red slippers in a dream indicates the happiness that She will enjoy them in her life. When she dreams that her husband gives her red slippers, this is evidence of family stability and marital happiness. While seeing wearing red slippers in a dream symbolizes the approaching date of the wedding of one of her children, and God knows best. If he sees red slippers in a dream, this is a sign of the many blessings that he will enjoy, God willing. God. This vision for a married woman can also indicate the beautiful qualities that she possesses, which makes the...

title: Interpretation of seeing Christianity in a dream according to Ibn Shaheen and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a Christian woman in a dream According to the interpretation of Ibn Shaheen and Ibn Sirin, Christianity is one of the religions that has spread in the world, and it comes second after the Islamic religion in its spread, and there are many Christians who differ. Countries of the world, seeing Christians is very possible in real life, and seeing him in a dream has different meanings and other meanings that can be reflected in the real life of the pioneer, so in this article we will learn together about the interpretation of seeing Christianity in a dream based on the interpretation of Ibn Shaheen and Ibn Sirin.Interpretation of a dream about seeing A Christian woman in a dream, interpretation of Ibn Shaheen. Ibn Shaheen says: Seeing a Christian in the house means victory over enemies and salvation from them. It also indicates the presence of enmity with one of the people, but without trouble or harm to the one who sees him, unless the person is the one who sees him. He sees that there is a Christian entering among him and greeting him, then this indicates security and safety from all harm. However, if one sees that a Christian woman has converted to Islam, this indicates that that person will convert to Islam soon or that he will die soon, but if one sees that the Christian woman has changed her religion To another religion, this vision indicates that. The lady is not well-behaved. But if a man sees in a dream a Christian woman or man ascending the pulpit and addressing Muslims, then this vision is considered an undesirable vision, because it indicates the emergence of a great calamity in a person’s life. But if a person sees in a dream that he has changed his religion to Christianity This indicates a lack of faith in all the grace of God, and this vision shows serious life problems. The Christian indicated that he would receive a large inheritance from his mother’s family. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a Christian woman in a dream Interpretation by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that if one sees in a dream that there is a Christian woman inside the Mosque of Mecca, this means that she has converted to Islam, but she is very afraid of her family and is trying to enter the mosque In turn. . To find the insurance you are looking for. If a man sees a Christian woman or man in a state of war, this vision indicates victory over enemies and salvation from them. However, if he sees himself entering a church accompanied by a Christian woman, this indicates the dreamer’s bad behavior. However, if a person sees a Christian sheikh in a dream, this means that the dreamer is committing many heresies and is walking on a path that leads him to hell, and this vision may indicate that this person is spreading false news and rumors among people. People.Seeing people of different religions than the dreamer’s original religion shows his interest in learning about other religions and cultures and reaching new and different stages in his life. Such dreams often do not come true, but there is a possibility of them coming true.

title: Interpretation of losing a neck in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman

preview.html: Losing an earring or an earring for girls and women, whether single, married, pregnant, divorced or widowed, and perhaps stealing an earring for a girl Losing a neck in a dream. One of the dreams that a large group of women see in dreams is that they think about the neck they have and fear losing it in public life, as the neck exists in life in many different forms that we see in our dreams and its issue. We are in a state of anxiety and confusion to get the correct interpretation, we will explain to you the interpretation of losing the neck in a dream as interpreted by the commentator Ibn Shaheen. Interpretation of losing the neck in a dream A married woman who sees that her earring is lost in a dream but does not find it indicates that she will suffer from some problems that she will face at home, whether with her husband or with her children. A married woman losing her earring in a dream indicates that her husband will lose a lot of money and suffer from financial problems. Losing the neck in an unmarried woman’s dream also indicates that her life is psychologically unstable and that she will suffer from many problems in the next stage. Losing a woman’s earring in a dream when she was happy indicates that she will soon get rid of some things that caused her a lot of trouble. The happiness of an unmarried woman after losing her neck in a dream also indicates that she will receive help from someone close to her in many important matters. Seeing in a dream that his earring has been lost and he did not find it is evidence that he will suffer from very difficult problems and may hear bad news soon. Losing the neck in a dream and not looking for it is evidence of his obedience to his family in the coming period. Losing the neck of a pregnant woman in a dream also indicates that she will face Many problems and many troubles that will arise during pregnancy. If a married man sees that he has a gold earring that he lost in a dream, this means that he will lose a lot of money and may incur a loss. If the engaged woman sees that her ring is lost in a dream, this is evidence that her engagement will end soon and she will leave her lover soon. Losing the neck in a dream for an unmarried woman, with no attention to it or searching for it, also indicates her ability to withstand pressure and get rid of her problems. It can lead to a scandal from someone she knows, but not from the family because he is unknown in the dream. title: Interpretation of ginger in a dream Drinking ginger in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Dreaming of ginger in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, and a pregnant woman. Eating ground ginger. Drinking juice. Drinking milk with green ginger. Ginger in a dream carries in its secrets many diverse interpretations that may raise many questions about its relationship to the real life of the dreamer. Ginger in a dream generally indicates the age that the person will live in. His life, and this lifespan is affected by the size of the ginger that the dreamer sees in his dream. Whoever sees in his dream that he is holding ginger in his hands, this is evidence of the chivalry that characterizes his kind and noble nature. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is eating ginger, this is a sign that he will enjoy health and strength and that he will recover from diseases. If he is sick. Whoever dreams during his sleep that someone else offers him ginger, this indicates that he will receive help from someone close to him, especially if he is facing a specific problem or crisis. The proliferation of ginger and its availability in large quantities in the dream also indicates the good and kind morals of the dreamer. And the good reputation that he will gain in his social and professional environment. Anyone who dreams of offering ginger to another person, this means that he will be the true link and support for that person and will give him the helping hand he needs, regardless of the type of problem he faces. Ginger is mentioned in the Holy Qur’an, and when we try to interpret it, we go back to its origin. The expression refers to the Qur’an and Sunnah. It was mentioned in the Almighty’s verse (And they drank a cup in which the mood was gingerbread). The clear meaning of this verse indicates that mingling and mingling arise from the mention of ginger in a dream. Using the lexical differences of the word ginger, we can distinguish between the meaning of grace and kindness, if The fortuneteller is one of the drinkers of this drink in a dream. The concept of longevity also appears because ginger is a perennial plant and after drying it is preserved for a long time. It also indicates the meaning of good remembrance and the good reputation for the good taste of ginger when used as a spice. Perhaps its presence in the context of the dream tissues plays a role in clarifying the concepts of healing because it is used In medical medicines. But ginger is depleted because it is not extracted from the ground except when it dries and its leaves wither. Ginger in a dream is distress and distress, and eating it is loss and harm, and God Almighty knows best. Seeing ginger - YouTube Seeing the distribution of ginger on YouTube

title: Interpretation of seeing a skinny girl in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Interpretation of a man’s vision of a thin girl: A man’s vision of a thin girl in a dream is a bad omen, as it indicates poverty, misery, lack of success in life, and a great need for others. It also indicates the loss of blessings and goodness in his last days. Also, the appearance of a thin girl to a man or her distance from him in a dream differs in interpretation. , as her appearance indicates many problems and difficulties facing the viewer, in contrast to her distance from him, where she sees the distance of her delicate girl. It indicates prosperity, spacious living, and lack of need for others. But if a man sees a thin but beautiful girl in a dream, this is an indication of the difficulty and seriousness of what he will face in the future. The dreamer does not know her in reality, but if the name of the skinny girl sounds good, then the dream is one of the praiseworthy visions. Interpretation of seeing a skinny girl for a single woman: When an unmarried girl sees a skinny girl in her dream, this indicates the worries and difficulties she faces in her life. But if the skinny girl is Chasing her, this indicates the shortness of life and the need of others. Seeing a skinny girl in a single woman’s dream is praiseworthy in most cases, especially if the skinny girl is injured or upset. This indicates the disappearance of worries and the absence of falling into trouble and enemy traps. If the skinny girl is beautiful, this indicates the emergence of temptation and her falling into the machinations of others. As for seeing a skinny girl who is pregnant, this portends evil, anxiety, and severe distress, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision of a skinny girl for a married woman if she sees A married woman sees a skinny girl leaving her house in her dream, this means that she will get rid of worries and difficulties, but if he sees her entering her house, this is a sign of the arrival of worries and problems. Naked, this indicates that the secret of a married woman will be revealed in front of everyone and criticized. The interpretation differs in the case of her husband marrying a skinny girl or divorcing her. In the case of marriage, it is a sign of narrow life, the need for others, and lack of livelihood, but in the case of divorce, it is a sign. To get rid of difficulties, worries, and problems. Interpretation of a dream of a thin girl with a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees a thin girl kissing him, this is a sign of the difficulties and hardships that she will go through in the near future.
preview.text: Interpretation of seeing a thin girl for a man A man's vision of a thin girl in a dream is a bad omen, as it indicates poverty, misery, lack of success in life, and great need for others, and it also indicates the loss of blessing and goodness in his last days. Also, the appearance of a thin girl to a man or her distance from him in a dream differs in interpretation, as her appearance indicates many problems and difficulties facing the viewer, unlike her distance from him, as she sees the distance of her thin girl. Naked, this indicates that the secret of the married woman will be revealed to everyone and criticized. The interpretation differs in the event that her husband marries a thin girl or divorces her. In the case of marriage, it is a sign of the hardship of life, the need for others and the lack of livelihood, while in the case of divorce, it is a sign. To get rid of difficulties, worries and problems. Interpretation of a dream about a thin girl with a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees a thin girl kissing her, this is a sign of the difficulties and hardships that she will go through in the near future.

title: Interpretation of a mother’s anger in a dream: Seeing a mother upset in a dream

preview.html: I dreamed of a mother being upset with a single, married, pregnant, divorced woman, if she died, dead, alive, sick, crying, screaming, the meaning of the mother’s anger at her daughter according to Ibn Sirin and more. Seeing a mother in a dream indicates relief and the dreamer’s ability to overcome the hardships and hardships that he is going through In reality. When the dreamer sees his mother dead in a dream, and this is not the case in reality, this is a sign of the problems that he will face and suffer in his life. If the dreamer talks to his mother in a dream, this portends him good news and the success of the projects he is working on in reality. Sadness A mother in a dream warns of the possibility of suffering from illness and suffering in reality. The mother’s anger and frowning in a dream indicate her dissatisfaction with the fortuneteller. When the dreamer sees the sadness of the dead mother in a dream, this is evidence of a categorical rejection of his actions in reality and her great responsibility towards him. The mother’s crying and obvious anger in a dream It symbolizes the dreamer’s great longing for everyone. Whoever sees his mother in a dream suffering from sadness and signs of discomfort, this may be evidence that he will soon suffer from an illness and that he will suffer major setbacks in life. As for whoever sees his mother calling him when she is dead, this may be evidence of negligence. The children towards their mother, or he is walking in a path other than the correct one that he should follow. The insightful person must pay attention to these interpretations that help him to be better by dealing with his mother, whether she is alive or dead, so that he can stand in this world and walk in the correct levels. Whoever sees In a dream or a dream that his deceased mother came to him and she was upset, worried, and sad, there are two things. He may have a debt that he did not pay before her death, and in this case he asks: the dreamer to pay the debt to her or someone on his behalf. If she does not have debts, then she may need charity, so... Her family and children are encouraged to purify her by praying and giving money to the poor. And if the mother calls her son or daughter in a dream while she is angry and upset, this indicates that the dreamer or woman is alone in his life and creates problems with those around him and she is not upright, and coming to her in a dream is to warn the visionary to walk On the straight path and avoiding creating trouble, Ibn Sirin dreams of a mother when she is upset - YouTube

title: The 8 most famous interpretations of seeing a quilt in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a quilt in a dream? It indicates a wife or the purchase of maids. What does it mean to see a black quilt? Evidence of his marriage to a scholar or an educated woman with great knowledge and knowledge. What is the interpretation of seeing a quilt in a man’s dream? Evidence of his wife’s good morals. What does it mean to see a quilt in a man’s dream? A black quilt? It indicates hatred, envy, and discontent. What is the interpretation of seeing a white quilt in a girl’s dream? Evidence that someone is protecting her and is very afraid of her. Interpretation of seeing a quilt in a dream. Seeing a quilt in a dream indicates a wife or the purchase of maids. Then whoever sees a burnt or damaged quilt Evidence of competition between a man and his wife. Then, seeing a quilt in a dream indicates in some dreams the joy and happiness experienced by the dreamer. Seeing a black man’s quilt. A man who sees in a dream that he is taking a quilt from someone is evidence of his marriage, and the quilt is evidence of the presence of a woman in the man’s life, which It will benefit him. Then, seeing a black quilt is evidence of his marriage to a scholar or an educated woman, with great knowledge and learning. Seeing a quilt cover in a man’s dream is a sign of his wife’s good morals. Hence, seeing a quilt in a young man’s dream is evidence of his intense love for his family. Al-Nabulsi’s explanation for cleaning a quilt: A quilt that is not spotted is good in a dream. After that, seeing a quilt being cleaned in a dream means that the dreamer will gain a benefit or benefit on his way to it. Seeing a white quilt symbolizes a good and generous man. After that, seeing a black quilt indicates malice And envy and grudges. Hence, seeing a short quilt is evidence of following a small diet. See a quilt cover for individuals. Seeing a quilt cover in a girl’s dream indicates her desire to have a life partner. Then the girl sees in a dream that she is bathing with a blanket or coat for warmth, then a man will propose to her A good and respectable marriage. Hence, seeing a white quilt in a girl’s dream is evidence that there is someone who protects her and fears her greatly. Interpretation of seeing a quilt in a dream for a married woman. A married woman who sees a clean, stained quilt is evidence that her husband is a responsible person. A quilt with a beautiful appearance indicates money. Which is owned by the insightful husband. The black quilt in the dream was not good for the married woman. After that, seeing a blue or pink quilt in the married woman’s dream means that you will get pregnant soon. Seeing the green quilt indicates that she is a woman committed to the teachings of the Islamic religion. Interpretation of seeing the Sufi quilt for the pregnant woman. Quilt In a pregnant woman’s dream, it is evidence that the baby is safe and that the birth will be easy. Then seeing a quilt is evidence of the birth of a boy. The quilt in a pregnant woman’s dream shows this woman’s love for her husband. So, seeing a woolen quilt in a dream is a sign that a new life will open for her.
